analysis.description:
ShamelessUETRipoff.startDate (/unique_chucks/39/0x1508b22098f563b420c5abfa0d270456369e38c4.sol#118-119) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- fallback (/unique_chucks/39/0x1508b22098f563b420c5abfa0d270456369e38c4.sol#228-244)

ShamelessUETRipoff.fallback (/unique_chucks/39/0x1508b22098f563b420c5abfa0d270456369e38c4.sol#228-244) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- secondbonus = (0 == uint256(blockhash(uint256)(block.number - 1)) % 256)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/39/0x1508b22098f563b420c5abfa0d270456369e38c4.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/39/0x1508b22098f563b420c5abfa0d270456369e38c4.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/39/0x1508b22098f563b420c5abfa0d270456369e38c4.sol#96) is not in mixedCase
